Posts.Content: Jan 5, 2012 08:49PM tigsun wrote: I worked full time in a hospital while on chemo.  An office job but i walked in the hallways, rode the elevators etc..  I washed my hands a lot and wiped everything down with alcohol......phone, computer keys etc.  i was able to avoid colds during my chemo.  it is funny i wanted to go out on disability but the doctor told me it was better to work and get my mind off cancer.
Posts.Title: Working while doing chemo ? JustJudi talbrig13
